column4: Intel to secure EU's okay for $16.7 billion Altera deal: sources
column5: World No. 1 chipmaker Intel Corp  will be given the go-ahead from the EU for its $16.7 billion bid for Altera Corp   its largest ever deal  two people familiar with the matter said on Friday.

column4: Intel to secure EU's okay for $16.7 bln Altera deal - sources
column5: World No. 1 chipmaker Intel Corp will be given the go-ahead from the EU for its $16.7 billion bid for Altera Corp  its largest ever deal  two people familiar with the matter said on Friday.

column4: UPDATE 2-Intel to secure EU's okay for $16.7 bln Altera deal - sources
column5: BRUSSELS  Oct 9 World No. 1 chipmaker Intel Corp  will be given the go-ahead from the EU for its $16.7 billion bid for Altera Corp  its largest ever deal  two people familiar with the matter said on Friday.

column4: EU to clear unconditionally $16.7 bln Intel  Altera deal - sources
column5: BRUSSELS  Oct 9 European Union antitrust regulators are set to approve U.S. chipmaker Intel Corp's  $16.7 billion offer for Altera Corp without requiring concessions  two people familiar with the matter said on Friday.
